statements: DELETE FROM defects WHERE defect_description = 'Software Bug'
DELETE FROM defects WHERE defect_id = 1 AND product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM defects WHERE defect_description LIKE '%critical%' AND root_cause = 'Unknown';
DELETE FROM ProductDefects WHERE product_name = 'Faulty Product';
DELETE FROM defects WHERE product_id = 10 AND defect_type = 'Software';
DELETE FROM root_cause_analysis WHERE defect_id = 5 AND analysis_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM product_history WHERE defect_id = 123 AND product_id = 456;
DELETE FROM root_cause_analysis WHERE analyzed_by = 'John Doe' AND root_cause LIKE '%hardware%' AND defect_id IN (SELECT id FROM defects WHERE defect_date < '2022-01-01');
